timeline.message:
Use text block for request body of LtiIntegrationTest

Note: "\" at the end of a line inside a text block prevents a new line \n from being inserted. This keeps the String on a single line while being formatted and well readable at the same time.

Use text blocks for the mock requests in ProgrammingSubmissionConstants

Note: \" is now replaced with " because escaping " is not required in a text block. JSON looks much more like JSON now.

Use text blocks for the test files' content in FileServiceTest

Note: by ending each line with "\r", we can keep the Windows CRLF endings in the text block. Newlines in text blocks themselves are always just "\n".
Use text block for the too-long-multiline-result string test
Use text blocks for text submission constants and move them to own file
Use test blocks for all test diagrams for the compass service
Use test blocks for all test diagrams for the compass service
Replace JSON text blocks by .json files in the test resource folder

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: The utility class name 'UMLActivityDiagrams' doesn't match '[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]+(Utils?|Helper|Constants)'
timeline.author: artemis-bot
